
### writer-priority (1)  {.smaller}

<pre><code>mutex_t lock; cond_t ok_to_read_cv; cond_t ok_to_write_cv;
int readers = 0, writers = 0;
int <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">waiting_writers</span> = 0;
</code></pre>
 
 
:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}
 
<pre><code>ReadLock() {
  mutex_lock(&amp;lock);
  while (writers != 0
         <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">|| waiting_writers != 0</span>) {
    cond_wait(&amp;ok_to_read_cv, &amp;lock);
  }
  ++readers;
  mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);
}

ReadUnlock() {
  mutex_lock(&amp;lock);
  --readers;
  if (readers == 0) {
    cond_signal(&amp;ok_to_write_cv);
  }
  mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);
}
</code></pre>
 
:::

::: {.column width="45%"}
 
<pre><code>WriteLock() {
  mutex_lock(&amp;lock);
  <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">++waiting_writers;</span>
  while (readers + writers != 0) {
    cond_wait(&amp;ok_to_write_cv, &amp;lock);
  }
  <span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">--waiting_writers;</span>
  ++writers;
  mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);
}

WriteUnlock() {
  mutex_lock(&amp;lock);
  --writers;
  if (<span data-fragment-index="2" class="fragment custom myem-only">waiting_writers != 0</span>) {
    <span data-fragment-index="3" class="fragment custom myem-only">cond_signal(&amp;ok_to_write_cv);</span>
  } else {
    <span data-fragment-index="3" class="fragment custom myem-only">cond_broadcast(&amp;ok_to_read_cv);</span>
  }
  mutex_unlock(&amp;lock);
}
</code></pre>
